content.speaker: Mr. SESSIONS
content.text:
Mr. SESSIONS. If there is no further business to come before the 
Senate, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand in adjournment 
under the previous order following the remarks of Senator Akaka, for up 
to 10 minutes.

content.speaker: The PRESIDING OFFICER
content.text:
The PRESIDING OFFICER. Without objection, it is so ordered.
  The Senator from Hawaii.
